intro:
Just saw it a second ago—why can’t you remember!? 
How far will your memory take you?
description:
A game that trains your memory and observation skills!

How to play is simple：
・Memorize every detail of the photo within a 1-minute time limit
・Choose the correct answer from 4 options for the part hidden by “?”

You can enjoy it solo at your own pace,
have fun with family and friends,
or even use it for streaming content!

If you manage to answer all the questions correctly,
you’ll earn the title of Memory Master!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
